Feb. 15, 2014 D Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship
Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship 0 Entertainments Contest
welsh-open-brass-band-entertainment-championship
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Best Soloist, Grant Jameson, Euphonium, Tongwynlais Band Best Cornet, David Leak, City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Youngest Player, Parc & Dare Bursary Award, Tongwynlais Band.
1st prize £1000 & CISWO Challenge Trophy 2nd prize £500 & Tower Colliery Trophy 3rd prize £300 & Doug John Trophy
Highest placed 1st section band not in the prizes £300 & Eifion W Rogers Trophy Sponsored by Narbeth Mechanical Services Abergavenny Borough
Most Entertaining Stage Presentation £300 & Porthcawl Town Council Trophy City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) 1
Best Instrumentalist Secretary’s Rosebowl Grant Jameson Euphonium Tongwynlais Temperance
Best Cornet Player Arthur Batten Memorial Trophy David Leak City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) 1
Youngest Instrumentalist Rosemary Deere Shield Carys Lewis Parc & Dare aged 9.
Graham Rees Memorial Bursary 2014 Harvey Rees Cornet Tongwynlais Temperance
Feb. 16, 2014, 5:17 p.m. July 3, 2020, 10:10 a.m.
1 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Steve Sykes
2 Tylorstown Band Gary Davies
3 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
